sentences.en: Airworthiness certification includes Type Certification and Production Certification , and other related work.
sentences.cn: 适航审定主要包括型号合格审定和生产许可审定及其他工作.

sentences.en: Certain services, such as certification authority, rely on a fixed computer name.
sentences.cn: 某些服务(如证书颁发机构)依赖固定的计算机名.

sentences.en: Company's products successfully passed ISO 9002 Quality System Certification ISO 10012 system certification measurement.
sentences.cn: 公司产品顺利通过ISO9002质量体系认证,ISO10012计量体系认证.

sentences.en: He received his certification as a high school English teacher.
sentences.cn: 他取得了中学英语教师证书.

sentences.en: Instrumentation Technician: Valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Instrumentation Technician certification is required.
sentences.cn: 仪表技术员: 有效艾伯塔省或跨省熟练工仪表技术员证书是必需的.

sentences.en: It includes all your training, certification, and diving gear.
sentences.cn: 其中包括所有训练 、 认证及潜水装备.

sentences.en: Once trained, the individual will go through our certification program.
sentences.cn: 经过培训后, 每位候选人将接收认证.

sentences.en: Organization code certification of your company . ( Original and one copy ) .
sentences.cn: 准备组织机构代码证原件和 复印件.

sentences.en: Pupils would be offered on-the-job training leading to the certification of their skill in a particular field.
sentences.cn: 学生将得到在岗培训的机会，从而获得某一行业的技能合格证书。

sentences.en: The certification is invalid without the signature of appraiser , checker and approver.
sentences.cn: 鉴定书无主检、审核、批准签字无效.

sentences.en: The company has passed ISO 9001 quality certification, ICP license.
sentences.cn: 公司已通过ISO9001质量认证 、 ICP经营许可证.

sentences.en: the medical certification of the cause of death
Through practice certification tests system design and key technologies.
sentences.cn: 通过实践验证检验系统设计方案和关键技术.

sentences.en: We successfully completed the certification for open water diving.
sentences.cn: 我们成功地拿到了开放水域潜水证书。

sentences.en: What is the impact of ISO 9001:2008 on certification?
sentences.cn: ISO9001:2008对认证证书有什么影响?

words.tran_cn: 可证明的；可确认的；可保证的
具有证明文件的；立有证据的；业经证明的
被证明的；有保证的；具有证明文件的
证明，证实；颁发合格证书（certify的过去分词形式）
发给证明书；以证书形式授权给…；用证书批准

trans.tran_en: an official document that says that someone is allowed to do a certain job, that something is of good quality etc
